description: A hearty beef stew slow cooked for incredible flavour. Throw in some ridiculously tasty cheesy toast and you've got yourself a family dinner hit.
keywords: French Onion & Beef Stew With Cheesy Bread
name: French Onion & Beef Stew With Cheesy Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Discard bay leaves and divide stew among bowls. Top with cheesy bread. Season with pepper. Serve scattered with remaining thyme.
